Desc.entry: Fourteen station fitness suite including cardiovascular and resistance machines, sauna and sunbooth. A gym induction assessment must be taken before using the gym. Training centre including lifeguard training and first aid courses. Private bookings can be taken. Has links with High Green Sports.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 7am-9pm (opening times), Mon-Fri 7am-9.30pm, Sat & Sun 7am-2.30pm (fitness suite)
